articles.title: Statins may help almost everyone with type 2 diabetes live longer
articles.description: New research suggests statins may protect adults with type 2 diabetes regardless of how low their predicted heart risk appears. articles.title: Electrons stop acting like particles—and physics still works
articles.description: Physicists have long relied on the idea that electrons behave like tiny particles zipping through materials, even though quantum physics says their exact position is fundamentally uncertain.
